mapper.select: SELECT vbr.record_id, vbr.product_id, vbr.product_name, vbr.viewed_at FROM VisitorBrowsingRecords vbr INNER JOIN Visitors v ON vbr.visitor_id = v.visitor_id WHERE v.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY vbr.viewed_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VisitorBrowsingRecords (visitor_id, product_id, product_name) VALUES (#{visitorId}, #{productId}, #{productName})
INSERT INTO UserBrowsingRecords (user_id, product_id, product_name, viewed_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{viewedAt})
